statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_1 FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 > 5;
SELECT preference_2, user_id FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, preference_3 FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preference_3 DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_2 = 10;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC, preference_1 ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, preference_1 FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_2 = 5 ORDER BY preference_1 DESC
SELECT preference_1, SUM(preference_2) AS total_preference_2 FROM user_preferences GROUP BY preference_1 HAVING total_preference_2 > 100
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_3 > preference_1 * 2 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT user_id, preference_3 FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 1 OR preference_3 IS NULL ORDER BY preference_3 ASC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_1 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_id DESC;
SELECT behavior_info FROM behavior_data WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value';
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preference_1, preference_2, user_id FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value1';
SELECT behavior_id, user_id, behavior_info FROM behavior_data WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY behavior_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT behavior_id, user_id, behavior_info FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_info LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, behavior_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM buildings WHERE building_rating > 4.5;
SELECT building_name, building_type FROM buildings WHERE building_type = 'Residential';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_age > 30 ORDER BY user_age DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_age < 25;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_age > 30 ORDER BY user_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT building_name, building_type, building_rating FROM buildings WHERE building_rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT building_name AS name, building_address AS address FROM buildings WHERE building_type = 'Office' OR building_type = 'Residential';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users JOIN preferences ON users.user_id = preferences.user_id WHERE preferences.preference_score > 7.0 ORDER BY users.user_name ASC;
SELECT building_name, building_address, building_rating FROM buildings WHERE building_type = 'Residential' AND building_rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY building_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name, email, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, category, preference_score FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM behavior_data ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, preference_score FROM preferences WHERE category = 'sports';
SELECT action_type, action_timestamp FROM behavior_data ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT recommended_item, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 75 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM preferences WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM preferences p JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE p.rating > 3;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(i.interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM users u JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
